p: Stuck with all your AWS sessions on the AWS Events app and not on your Google Calendar/ Outlook Calendar/ Apple Calendar?.
This is the open source GitHub project page for the AWS re:Invent iCal C hrome extension. The Chrome extension for generating iCal from the AWS re:Invent My agenda page.

l: Import iCal events into your calendar with this Chrome extension
p: Install the AWS re:Invent iCal Chrome extension
Login to AWS Events app and navigate to My agenda
Click on the extension icon and click on Download iCal
Browse to the Downloads directory and import the iCal file into your calendar of preference.

With enough support for the Chrome extension, we could host generated iCal files and provide calendar links that you can import into your Google / Microsoft / Apple calendars and stay updated as your calendar on AWS even ts keep changing throughout the re:Invent season.
Import your iCal file to your calendar of choice using the documentation links provided below.
Add calendar events to Apple Calendar
For any issues or errors with this script, please raise an issue here
If you encounter a bug or think of a useful feature, or find something confusing in the docs, please create a new issue.
I ♥️ pull requests. If you'd like to fix a bug or contribute to a feature or simply correct a typo, please feel free to do so.
If you're thinking of adding a new feature, consider opening an issue first to discuss it to ensure it aligns with the direction of the project and potentially save yourself some time.
